title: Temo - Emotion-Based Drone Interaction
description: An innovative project integrating facial emotion recognition with a DJI Tello drone. Temo interprets human facial expressions to control drone behavior, creating an interactive and responsive aerial experience. Using the ROS2 Tello wrapper developed by the SNT-ARG Team from the University of Luxembourg.

title: Temo - Tello Mixed Reality Handcontrol
description: This innovative project integrates facial emotion recognition with a DJI Tello drone to create an interactive and responsive aerial experience. TEMO interprets human facial expressions to control drone behavior, enabling dynamic human-drone interaction. It is built upon the ROS2 Tello wrapper developed by the SNT-ARG Team at the University of Luxembourg. The current second iteration of TEMO expands the system significantly by introducing several new modules and control methods: full control using a PS4 controller, full control via smartphone IMU sensors, full control using an ESP32 paired with an MPU9250 sensor, and an immersive target shooter game from the drone's perspective, where users interact with ArUco markers as targets. These new features aim to push the boundaries of intuitive drone interaction, making TEMO more versatile and engaging than ever before.

title: RPI2-FreeRTOS-CAN-BUS
description: This project extends FreeRTOS for the Raspberry Pi 2, enabling CAN BUS communication capabilities. It features SPI drivers, MCP2515 controller support, and integrates TACLEBENCH for embedded systems benchmarking. The implementation facilitates real-time task management and inter-device communication in embedded applications.

title: Website for the ASBL Alma Da Beira Alta
description: A responsive website developed for the non-profit organization Alma Da Beira Alta, dedicated to preserving Portuguese folklore. The site provides information about the group's mission, upcoming events, and participation opportunities. It includes a custom CMS built with React and Firebase, allowing administrators to manage content, track finances, and handle event registrations efficiently. The website is designed to be user-friendly and visually appealing, with a focus on showcasing the organization's activities and heritage.

title: Portfolio Website
description: A personal portfolio website showcasing projects and skills. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it features a dark theme with red accents and smooth animations. The site is designed to be responsive and user-friendly, providing an overview of professional experiences and technical proficiencies.
